nodes.text: R2-F1P was an R2 series astromech droid with white, silver, yellow, and orange plating and a black sensor. Like all R2 astromech droids, it stood 0.96 meters tall and was manufactured by Industrial Automaton. Its status indicator could be red or blue in color when on.

In 13 BBY, R2-F1P was present in Coronet Spaceport in Coronet City on the planet Corellia. Following a security alert being sounded in the spaceport after a breach of the customs gates, the droid rolled past a human family being violently separated by Imperial stormtroopers.

R2-F1P was created for the 2018 Anthology film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. The droid was first revealed prior to the film's release as part of a Star Wars: Droid Factory toy set produced by Hasbro Inc. earlier in 2018.
